function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Large-scale anti-contagion policies may have slowed the COVID-19 pandemic, suggesting that interventions have reduced the severity of the outbreak.","Impact":"Reduced severity of the outbreak, large health benefits, and lower number of confirmed cases in various countries.","Mitigation":"Continued implementation and enforcement of anti-contagion policies.","Technologies":"Monitoring and surveillance technologies, contact tracing apps, and public health communication tools.","People":"Population at risk of contracting COVID-19.","Owner":"Government health agencies, policymakers, and public health organizations."},{"Description":"Limitations of available data pose challenges to the analysis.","Impact":"Possibility of inaccuracies in estimating the effects of policy actions and health outcomes.","Mitigation":"Continued data collection, analysis, and refinement of estimation methods as more data become available.","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis tools, statistical modeling software, and healthcare information systems.","People":"Data analysts, researchers, and public health experts.","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies, and public health organizations."}]}
